title: Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area: Contact Public Affairs
body: Contact Public Affairs       Bighorn Canyonâ€™s Division of Interpretation handles media inquiries, including digital image requests, and press releases. Park Information For general information regarding the national monument, please call the Bighorn Canyon Visitor Center at 307-548-5406, or you may send your request via e-mail. Media Information For media inquiries contact the Park Ranger Interpretation Christy Fleming at 307-548-5404, or you may send your request via e-mail. National Park Service Media Contacts Complete listing of contacts nationwide by region and park office.
